message-pack.name: SWIFT - Common Messages
message-pack.description:
S.W.I.F.T. SCRL is the abbreviation for Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication, Societe Cooperative a Responsibilite Limited. SWIFT's purpose is to provide technology-based communication services across all financial markets through member banks so that they can profitably meet their own and their end-customers' needs. Minimum dependency for this message pack is Swift Plugin 5.1.2. This pack includes Common category with the following messages-
  1. MTAllTags
  2. MTGeneric
  3. MTn90
  4. MTn91
  5. MTn92
  6. MTn95
  7. MTn96
  8. MTn98
  9. MTn99
MTAllTags - This message consists of all the tags like 11 to 99 which are extensively used in a swift message. MTGeneric - This message is a generic message which can be used in place of any user message from MT101 to MT999. MTn90, MTn91, MTn92, MTn95, MTn96, MTn98, MTn99 - These messages are generic under 90, 91 or other series (e.g. MTn90 can be used in place of MT190, MT290... Same goes with others). For additional information please refer Release notes/readme document.
